title: New: Frank Ocean – Pyramids
body:
Of all the **Odd Future** crew, it’s rapidly becoming apparent who is the most talented.

Aside from working with **Beyonce**, **Kanye** and **Jay-Z**, **Frank Ocean** has also found time to finish off his own debut LP, **_Channel Orange_**, scheduled for release 16 July, and in typical **Ocean** style, he’s dropped a ten minute track in celebration. _Pyramids_ steps it up a notch, developing the slick R&B sound pioneered by the likes of **The-Dream** and **The Weeknd**, with more than a whiff of **Marvin Gaye** thrown into the mix.
